title: Network Evaluation error.
body:
OS: Windows 10 DeepLabCut Version: 2.2b7 Anaconda env used: DLC-GPU **Describe the problem** Hi, After training network, if I start an evaluation of the network the process stops halfway and give this error message. Please, can you help me to solve this issue? Please place code inside this:
Code output
